survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Smart Kitchen Appliances Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and behaviors regarding smart kitchen appliances to inform product development and marketing strategies.

questions.question_text: Which of the following smart kitchen appliances do you currently own?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple appliances. Ensure options cover a broad range of common smart kitchen devices.

script.question_text: Which of the following smart kitchen appliances do you currently own?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart kitchen appliances?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 does not select 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the question is skipped if respondent does not own any smart kitchen appliances.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart kitchen appliances?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 does not select 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: What features do you value the most in smart kitchen appliances?
answer_options: Integration with other smart home devices
questions.client_notes: Allow respondents to select multiple features and provide an open-ended option for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an open-text option for 'Other'

script.question_text: What features do you value the most in smart kitchen appliances?
answer_options: Integration with other smart home devices

questions.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about using smart kitchen appliances?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback on concerns or barriers.

script.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about using smart kitchen appliances?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to purchase additional smart kitchen appliances in the next 12 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure purchase intent. Useful for forecasting market demand.

script.question_text: How likely are you to purchase additional smart kitchen appliances in the next 12 months?
